model.name: Damier Spread Short-Sleeved Hook Detail Shirt
model.disambiguatingDescription: This crisp, breezy shirt features randomly dispersed hand-written Louis Vuitton signatures, which gradually coalesce into a Damier motif around the upper chest and shoulders. It has a hidden button tab giving it a neat, functional appearance and is signed with a pin hook detail beneath the collar.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 78% Cotton, 22% Polyamide
  • Blue Shadow
  • Regular Fit 
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 36’’ / 92 cm, height 6' 0½’’ / 184 cm
  • Made in Italy
